Review.Titre: I have been trying for months to get…
Review.Contenu: I have been trying for months to get Parallels to resolve an issue with my subscription including with calls and emails and all I get is form replies that are not whatsoever responsive.

Review.Titre: scammy, no renewal warning
Review.Contenu: No auto-renewal warning and auto-renew is always on by default. Make sure you put a calendar event or some other time-based reminder to cancel.Yes, it's not illegal, and you got my $99, parallels, but you will never have my business again. Ever.

Review.Titre: Dont use Parallels for games
Review.Contenu: If you want to use Parallels for games dont. I figured this out the expensive way after buying Windows and Parallel only to find out that the larger game companies Block Virtual Machines. Including Riot, Epic and Steam. I feel like iv been scammed

Review.Titre: Automatic payment taken from Paypal…
Review.Contenu: Automatic payment taken from Paypal account without notification and warning of it taking place until after it happened.  Contacted Parallels Support straight away got a reply a day later from their Customer Support Engineer requesting further details and documentary proof which has now been sent twice. still waiting a week later on a reply and the refund being paid back to my account.  At same time contacted Paypal to raise an objection Paypal has refused to refund escalated to an appeal and waiting on a reply.  Further email sent to same Customer Support Engineer this morning also awaiting reply.Update:  email requests to Parallels ignored no response from the company and Paypal refused refund found in favour of the business despite no notification being about to be taken until after it happened if I could would rate this as zero stars. advise others to be careful of this business and their practices.

Review.Titre: No Subscription Payment warning
Review.Contenu: Paid for and downloaded but then realised it did not do what I wanted, no complaints there but then a year later they renewed the subscription with no warning that the money was being taken from my account and with no chance to opt-out. Watch the subscription renewals.

Review.Titre: Problematic - not worth the time wastedz
Review.Contenu: I have had nothing but problems with Parallels on my Mac.  I had it years back and trying to connect it to machines or even external webcams or anything like that is hit and miss.I bought it again last month hoping it’s probably improved.No such luck.  Completely crashed halfway through using it to run my software to operate a machine, couldn’t us my mouse.  Telling me to press Ctrl+del which unlocked the mouse, but as soon as I clicked again it was locked.  Then after 5 mins of trying to fix it, black screen of death appeared and it crashed.  Lost all my software and I am struggling to fix all the problems it caused by trying to retrieve my expensive software.  No option to speak to anyone.  I subscribed to an expensive package to have support 24/7 😂 What a joke.  It just takes you to a community forum to ask the public.  Its like the blind leading the blind.  Support never replies and when it does it’s generic and unhelpful. It is easier to buy a Windows computer.  Don’t even bother with this.

Review.Titre: Don’t buy
Review.Contenu: Bought a permanent license and paid a bit of a higher price. Apple brings out a new upgrade and then Parallels want to try and rip users off for another $99. Use crossover instead. Customer service (Adeeb) didn’t help much either, no understanding. Just happy to try and rip users off. Acted surprised that Apple brought out a new upgrade of OSX, then just blamed Apple and threw them under the bus.

Review.Titre: Works... but barely
Review.Contenu: The software technically works, but you better have NASA's computer or something. My MB Air <1 year old would get completely weighed down when running Parallels to the point where there was a 2-3 second lag for everything. It's basically unusable when each click takes a few seconds to register. Fortunately, my laptop would run perfectly again once Parallels was shut down, but the product was worthless to me.Don't waste your time or money, there have to be other products that work better than this trash.

Review.Titre: Too difficult to pay for
Review.Contenu: If you're going to sell a product then at least make it easy for customers to pay.    It want's me to set up a subscription,  which the quantity of licenses is too high, I need to reduce it,  but I can only do that by letting it expire causing everyone an inconvenience.   And then they don't invoice you but expect credit card payment.   Surely collecting money in is a priority?   It doesn't seem so,  so I won't be investing!

Review.Titre: The version I bought just 6 months ago won't work any longer
Review.Contenu: Purchased like 6 months ago Parallels 17, which was latest release, still celebrated by the producer like a great tool. After 6 months, I received yesterday an email that the next release of MacOSX won't support Parallels 17, so either I buy the 18 for 70 euros, or I basically wated my money for 6 months (and I paid 100 for 17). Absurd that these things are obliged by the law. Never buy again from these people. There are identical and even free alternatives. Really, don't support who behaves like this.

Review.Titre: Mediocre product that didnt work with…
Review.Contenu: Mediocre product that didnt work with ExcelSo I contacted support who were so slow to respond, then came back with a generic, unhelpful responseI'm so glad I was only on the trial version, with this level of support while on a trial, I'm not sure how they can expect someone to purchase!I made it clear I was on the trial, no effort made to resolve my issue and no follow up response to my query! Poor service

Review.Titre: Money Gobbling Thieves!
Review.Contenu: This company has already gobbled more than £100 over 02 years and now wants more money after i have upgraded to Apple’s latest os on my macbook. I am pretty sure its run by a corporate & a greedy bunch of cowboys who keep on sending me emails to “upgrade” as the current software i have is not “optimised” and “compatible” with the latest apple release! Bloody Thieves!

Review.Titre: Parallels runs Windows 11 but DOES NOT…
Review.Contenu: Parallels runs Windows 11 but DOES NOT RUN .NET 6!!  So can not run many current applications. I purchased the "pro" level license. I DID NOT RENEW.  I have run into heaps of problems and the support is 95% abysmal. Utterly maddening! This product is grossly overpriced. You are better off purchasing an inexpensive windows machine because it will meet any needs that you have in computing power that you would get from running windows on parallels. the search function of their data base makes it almost useless. Contacting support generates a regurgitation email where they request the information that you already gave them. After dozens of attempts to contact their support I did get one person that was helpful. I am not sure how it is that they have a Gmbh?? I have never had a German or Austrian person reply, ever. The support people are not English or German speakers.

Review.Titre: It's a total disaster
Review.Contenu: It's a total disaster. If you are a Mac user that needs to occasionally run parallel windows you will be confused beyond measure. You will not be able to save the file back to your Mac and you will totally waste your time and money. Dont bother

Review.Titre: Useless
Review.Contenu: I downloaded this software because it said it was able to run video games. My laptop met the specifications required, but the games ran so poorly that I think I would rather have tried on a microwave. Waste of hours of set-up, especially for the cost.

Review.Titre: Do not buy
Review.Contenu: Back on August 7/22 I bought Parallels  Desktop 17 for my Macbook M1 Pro , secretly these people knew it didn't work with Macbook M1 Pro, they knew it had problems . I  could not get them to tell me it didn't until they had danced me around for days until suddenly they turn around and say Desktop 18 works for  Macbook M1 Pro but they put a deadline that meant I was 8 days too late to get a free upgrade. I finally said I wanted a refund  but now its a couple days too late for a refund for this failure of an app. Worst company ever.

Review.Titre: Ein Fall für den Verbraucherschutz
Review.Contenu: Ein Fall für den Verbraucherschutz. Bei technischen Problemen gibt es keine Möglichkeit, mit dem Support in Kontakt zu treten. Die Antworten hier von Parallels zu anderen Beiträgen sind Ironie pur: „Wenn Sie bereit sind, wieder mit unserem Support-Team zusammenzuarbeiten, würden wir Ihnen gerne helfen"Nur leider gibt es keine Möglichkeit, mit dem Support zusammenzuarbeiten. Jeder Link führt ins Nichts! Es gibt keine E-Mailadresse, keine Telefonnummer. Ein Formular für habe ich gefunden. Hier die Antwort die per E-Mail kam:"Please note that questions about orders at parallels.com, Parallels product licenses or technical issues will not be answered.If you need help, please sign in to your Parallels account or create one, and go to the Support page.Select your product and the category of your question. Enter a short issue description or key words into the search box. If you don't find the solution you are looking for, click Request Support and proceed to the Support contact options.Regards,The Parallels Support Team"Und auf der Support Page führt wieder alles ins Nichts.

Review.Titre: Extremely Misleading!
Review.Contenu: Extremely misleading. All photos show that Microsoft is the main VM so I thought it was part of it. Even during the trial, Microsoft 11 was the operating system. After the free trial, I purchased Parallels license. However, now it requires you to activate Microsoft separately, which means you have to purchase another license.

Review.Titre: they don't want to solve anything
Review.Contenu: they don't want to solve anything, they just insist on buying another license for a new product, where the old license is perpetual and it doesn't work! I really do not recommend this company, it's a waste of your money and monthly nerves

Review.Titre: Beware!!!
Review.Contenu: I purchased parallels in July 2022, just received an email in September 2022 telling me that the version I purchased will not be compatible with apples new update. I have to upgrade for another £54 to get it to work. They will only offer free upgrades if the license was purchased sometime in august. Customer services is useless and offer no help at all. Will not be using them again

Review.Titre: no warning renewal funds fom account
Review.Contenu: Be aware no warning about taking renewal funds from your account. Renewal email arrives same time money removed from account Then try to get £79.99 returned. Very complex procedure.

Review.Titre: Higher price after 25% discount...
Review.Contenu: I did a free trial, I liked the app, but the price (advertised as starting at $ 99) seemed to expensive to me.I didn't buy it.I received an email after the trial period expired, saying I can fill a survey and get 25% off.I did fill the survey, received an email with the discount, clicked on buy now and the scam showed up!The price went up to $ 144, $ 110 after discount.Of course I didn't buy it and I won't in the future.I thought this was a serious company, but they are a joke

Review.Titre: Subscription not cancelled and keep charging
Review.Contenu: I purchased sometime back parallels license for mac book pro and in Dec 2021 i switched off auto renewal on my subscription. Just now realised they continued with auto renewal at the end of 2022 also."Reference #251794000: Subscription auto-renewal for Parallels Desktop for Mac Pro Edition (1 Year) canceled - Subscription auto-renewal canceledAuto-renewal of "Parallels Desktop for Mac Pro Edition (1 Year)" has been canceled. The current subscription period ends on 11/12/2022.Click here to read more about managing your subscriptions.To see additional information about your purchase, go here."Ref: 374171549 - Auto renewed ref number from email i got last friday.

Review.Titre: I am trying to install Parallels but I…
Review.Contenu: I am trying to install Parallels but I cannot. I asked help, at least six support agents took over my computer, not one of them understand. Worse is they blame the customers who are asking help. This company is a scam, selling product that don't work.

Review.Titre: This has been the worst software…
Review.Contenu: This has been the worst software purchase experience for me! I paid the $100+ for the standard version, installed it and installed Windows 11 on my M1 Mac. I was so excited to finally start playing my Steam games, but none of my games would launch! I couldn't even install the Xbox app! What is the point of me buying this thing and setting up Windows if none of my games could run? They didn't mention this compatibility issue on their website. They only mentioned all the pros but none of the cons. They just want you to pay as quickly as possible! So misleading! DON'T BUY PARALLELS DESKTOP! IT IS A SCAM!

Review.Titre: Do NOT UPDATE your current VM - they will charge you €69.95 later
Review.Contenu: Very poor customer support, even for paying and long-term customer! I was asked to update my version of Parallels. This was not the normal UPGRADE notification asking for payment before you upgrade. After running the update, I was asked to enter my key, which did not work for this version! I was told I had to pay for an upgrade to open my VM. This looks like a new and very sneaky way of getting customers to upgrade! I contacted customer support immediately, telling them I needed urgent help as I had to work on my VM for a client - 3 days later nothing has been sorted out, just a couple of very unhelpful emails from their support team!From the other negative comments here, I'm not alone in experiencing poor service from this company! I'm having trading standards looking into what happened.

Review.Titre: Not brilliant
Review.Contenu: Not brilliant, sadly...I tried the trial because I needed to run windows on my mac, and hoped this would fit my needs. I didn't have to run anything too powerful, but I found when I had Parallels open, it pretty much rendered my M1 IMac useless for absolutely everything else. This was even the case even when I had nothing open on Parallels. Everything on my Mac OS would repeatedly freeze for 30 seconds at a time and the whole process became very frustrating, very quickly. Not sure if this just happens in the trial version, but when I tried to contact customer support about it, I couldn't find out how to email or contact an actual person. All I got were suggestions to go to the forum, or talk to the bot. Not sure if they reserve live support chat for paying customers, but it doesn't give one confidence to purchase for the full version if you cant even talk to someone about the trail not working as advertised.

Review.Titre: Windows will run web browser.. that's it.
Review.Contenu: Really easy to set up and swipe between the different OS as satisfying.But I really thought that I stared a trial version, but I didn't, I stared the package deal version, and I count turn back, didn't get a respons from the support.I Purchased Win 11 by mistake as well, but it is included in the package, which is really good, but I unfortunately missed it.About the specs in the Windows, It will not give you "Minecraft", "Fallguys", playable game engine experience. I could start Rocket league after 60 min of struggle with the Epic games launcher, but it wasn't playable. The Epic games and steam could not event start most of the time, I searches for a couple of hours to find performance settings to fix this, I have the M1 Mac, I tried a few things but it didn't help.Running parallels (with no else program open in windows) Slows down and freezes the Mac OS from time to time, at least once every 4 hours.I really regret my pushes to parallels, Ive stopped my subscription and informed about this as well.

Review.Titre: i bought parallels 16 edition 2 years…
Review.Contenu: i bought parallels 16 edition 2 years ago. I had to reset my mac and now that i'm trying to downloads it again, parallels always send me to the 18 edition, and try to charge me a new license.I dont want to buy a new license, i just want my 16 edition

Review.Titre: Very similar experience to other…
Review.Contenu: Very similar experience to other reviewers. The support team is obviously not reading my detailed problem after days of waiting for a response. Good product bad customer service. This does not influence me to spend money and continue to be their customer. Also, my issue is on their forums, but their solutions do not work for me, why I went to customer service, which from this experience appears to only be a bot with automatic replies.

Review.Titre: I wish I never heard of it
Review.Contenu: They want about £50 every couple of years. In 20 years, you spend about £500 on a software that is not that impressive, and if you don't upgrade, there is an error message saying your Parallels software can't be opened because it's out of date and the only way is to upgrade in order to have access to your data. Seems like a subtle scam to me!Follow-up: I received the following at the end after they contacted me for several days: Dear Ehsan,Thank you for the provided data.Let me clarify, judging from our database, you are using Parallels Desktop 12 and you have macOS 10.14 (Mojave) installed.Parallels Desktop 12 is partly compatible and may work incorrectly with macOS 10.14 (Mojave), more information about compatibility you can find in this article: [link deleted].Parallels Desktop 14 and up is compatible with macOS 10.14.We recommend you to update Parallels Desktop to the latest version 18.Since you have Parallels Desktop 12 you can buy an upgrade license saving part of the money: [link deleted]Should you have any additional questions, let us know.Have a nice week!Best regards,--Pavel MerkulovCustomer Support Engineer||Parallels

Review.Titre: Misleading installation process - no mention of account requirement
Review.Contenu: I am extremely disappointed, after having spent $130 on Parallels 18 and being so excited to set it up and start using it, I download the application and get my serial number ready to put it in and what am I greeted with? "Please sign up for your account now". I'm sorry what? Why the hell do I want to sign up an account? Throughout the entire purchase process from start to finish there was never a single mention EVER about having to create an account in order to activate the software. If I had known I wouldn't have bought it in the first place. I'm sick of these tech companies using the illusion of "Oh it's for your benefit" to farm everyone for accounts over and over and over again, just keep your hands off our bloody data. No, I will not open an account with you, I spent $130 with you already let me plug in my bloody serial number and move on with my life. Utter waste of my time and I cannot express how upsetting it is that this account requirement was never mentioned once to me. Total waste of my time and money, and an absolute clinical example of corporate tech industry user data greed. I'm extremely disappointed.

Review.Titre: I purchased Parallels for Mac a yr+…DISAPPOINTMENT2
Review.Contenu: I purchased Parallels for Mac a yr+ ago...its now time to renew....there is no help available for that...the computer responds that "do not recognize that email address". & the phone always is a hang up...GREAT BACK UP SUPPORT...CAN WE RATE YOU AS ABISMAL?>?>? YES OF COURSE, IT FITS.

Review.Titre: company said it would contact me after…
Review.Contenu: company said it would contact me after a complaint, but they didn't and my problem persists. It's sad to see that they have a good product but a lack of customer support

Review.Titre: Shocking Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I have been a long time user (since 2008) of Parallels but have never had to contact support until a few weeks agoA year ago I needed a second Parallels Desktop license. This year I only need the one. There is no way of removing a license & paying for the other. It appears to be both or none.I contacted support & was told to open a new account (purchasing one license) but that would  mean paying more for one license than I was for twoI was asked to contact sales & was given an email address & US phone number. I did not want to make an international call (I am un UK) so emailed sales - No response. I emailed again - As yet no response.I asked support (via the same ticket) to help. Call sales they said. There is nothing we can do.More than once I asked support to escalate my ticket - No responseMore than once I asked how do I make a formal complaint - No response.Out of options I have now purchased the perpetual license (which has less functionality).I will use that version until VMware are ready with VMware Fusion (I have an M1 Mac). It's currently in beta but as yet there is no way to import a Parallels virtual machine.

Review.Titre: I want to try V18 and it says I already…
Review.Contenu: I want to try V18 and it says I already had a free trial - I didn't - and want to see if my game will run - if it will, I will purchase - thank you

Review.Titre: Terrible company as it made their…
Review.Contenu: Terrible company as it made their software so difficult to download and has nonexistent customer support requiring customers to search for hours for live assistance! DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING from this company!

Review.Titre: It is destroyed! I wasted my money on you guys.
Review.Contenu: It won't open and if I do, it's completely lagged and screens are cut in half and some weird colorful lines!

Review.Titre: Crashes and uses way to much disc space
Review.Contenu: Requires huge amount of disc space which mac users do not have. Runs very slowly due to this use of the disc. Would recommend Citrix instead.

Review.Titre: Support is too late and not incorrect…
Review.Contenu: Support is too late and not incorrect answer.Don't expect nice support.it's very sloppy.

Review.Titre: Pathetic support behind a wonderful product
Review.Contenu: Another example of a good product with pathetic support. At times the people running the support can't even read their own responses or forum posts; and then offer clarifications.And; to my surprise - their billing partner is unable to renew my subscription and fails to provide me with an non-subscription one click payment and tried to force me into a "new" purchase.

Review.Titre: Great product but the worst support I have ever experienced
Review.Contenu: The first time I contacted support the responses were so bad and inconsistent that I eventually had to resolve the problem myself. It was self evident that the staff dealing with my problem didn't read my problem description.Now I have a serious audio problem when running Windows 11 with Parallels and other than one "boiler plate" response I have been left hanging without any further replies.The problem is not unique to myself and has numerous complaints on Parallels forum.It's as if Support is divorced from the main operation?

Review.Titre: Be careful with automatic renewal
Review.Contenu: BE careful with automatic renewal.  On the day they charged my credit card for an automatic renewal I wrote to cancel my subscription.  They didn’t.  Instead they wrote back to say my subscription would end a year from now.  I called Parallels support and in a long call they finally said a refund would be issued.  When I received credit card refund it was for %75 of what I had been charged! That’s not what I expected nor do I feel that I was treated fairly.  Be careful dealing with these people.  They don’t seem to act in good faith. It may not be wise to subscribe.

Review.Titre: Loved the Product UNTIL I needed Support
Review.Contenu: A long time user of Parallels. I upgraded my Mac to an M1 (ARM). I installed Windows 11 and unfortunately my 64BIT odbc / registries are not working. I tried over 10 different drivers. I reached out to support and never got a response to my first email. No one was ever on chat. I finally get an email and all they tell me is reach out to the developers of the drivers - did not ask any follow-up or try to diagnose. Very unfortunate experience.

Review.Titre: Waste of time
Review.Contenu: Took me several hours to "try" and install it on my M1 Max MacBook Pro and after several searches on google for what to do whet the installer says "no internet connection" and so on, managed to find ways of manually allow the permissions this app wants and then it says it cannot find some iso file and that there is no OS installed in this virtual machine...It seems that every thing that has to do with Windows is a complete waste of time...

Review.Titre: Support couldn’t be any worse and the…
Review.Contenu: Support couldn’t be any worse - took several attempts over a period of months and then the response I finally got was unrelated to the issue in any capacity. The software is loaded with bugs - especially with regard to how it deals with USB accessories. The so called support is as close to a scam as you can get while riding the grey line. It kinda works for some things sometimes, but you can’t trust it. Interesting update… parallels responded to this post before the open support chat and multiple messages that have been sent since Jan 2022.

Review.Titre: Unhelpful and unresponsive customer…
Review.Contenu: Unhelpful and unresponsive customer service.I have raised an issue with support via facebook messenger. The issue (registration) is straightforward and lies with Parallels. Without it being addressed the application can't be used. The issue has been raised 3 weeks ago. The communication is very inconsistent, untimely and noncommittal. The issue has not been fixed yet.

Review.Titre: The worst support ever received
Review.Contenu: The worst support ever received. You pay $99.99 and receive no support for your money, above this, when you need support you have to pay them an additional $30.00 odd to receive support for a product you bought not more than 6 months ago.When you buy it cause you are forced to, there is just no support. This is absolutely absurd. Don't waste your money when you really need it, it is the most useless company.

Review.Titre: Great Software but Tech Support sucks!
Review.Contenu: I love the software but the tech support sucks.  Not just a little, a lot!  I had to delete my account because I wanted one of the 3 lic keys removed from my account.  I asked that a key be removed, I was asked which one, so I sent them the key.  Nothing happened and in the mean time my subscription expired.  It then went past the grace period.  My software on the two machines I use stoped functioning.  So…… I deleted my account, created a new one under a different email address and purchased two new license keys.  I then used the new keys to get my two laptops working again.  For the life of me I have no idea why they don’t give the account owner the option of blowing away a key.

Review.Titre: Will randomly stop working with NO SUPPORT
Review.Contenu: The virtual machine suddenly stopped working one day after alerting me to pay for the new update and I declined. The machine then stated "Unable to connect Hard Disk 1" and stopped working. So I bought the new update but it still didn't work. I tried calling and chatting with tech support but after an hour I still could not reach anyone. Trust your money in a more trustworthy company, Parallels will just take your money and run away with it.

Review.Titre: I bought an license for my old iMac…
Review.Contenu: I bought an license for my old iMac (parallels 16) on January 2021. The Mac was broken and i.m trying to install the same version os parallels 16. Unfortunately the system install the new version (parallels 17 with windows 7) and don't accept my license. I need to buy other key to activate the same software bought this year!! Unacceptable!

Review.Titre: Irresponsible Support team
Review.Contenu: Only during the Trial period, they respond you for the tickets. Once I purchase a license, getting their response for my tickets are happens very rarely. If we call, either you will be on long wait( more than an hour but still no one responds) or they will disconnect the call abruptly.It is time to change their support team Vendor. Worst experience. I really regret purchasing the license just because of irresponsible support team

Review.Titre: Parallells 16 crashes the computer…
Review.Contenu: Parallells 16 crashes the computer every time there's a Microsoft update. It then takes several hours (up to 7!) to re-boot the computer so I can carry on working. Parallels will charge for instant support after the initial 30 days. Otherwise, it's free if you wait for e-mail support that takes around 24 hours! Totally unacceptable!

Review.Titre: You asked for support ? LOL
Review.Contenu: For all customers who are waiting for a response from support, I invite you to file a complaint with the justice of your country so that this scam stops. We all pay for this service, as well as for support.For European customers, you can refer to articles L217-1 and following of the Consumer Code.Hoping that Parallels finally takes the demands of its own customers seriously

Review.Titre: No support!
Review.Contenu: I purchased, downloaded, and installed.  When I try to start, it demands a password.  The password I was asked to select earlier in the process apparently was accepted, but it was rejected, as is the replacement pass.  It is impossible to get someone to explain this to; my chat is always timed out, the phone number is either busy or sends me in circles.  No support!!!

Review.Titre: Não autorizei a cobrança de R$399,47 em…
Review.Contenu: Não autorizei a cobrança de R$399,47 em meu cartão de crédito!!!Foi feita uma renovação automática,indevida.Estou no aguardo do estornoI did not authorize the charge of BRL 399.47 in... I did not authorize the charge of R$399.47 to my credit card!!! An automatic, improper renewal was done. I'm waiting for the chargeback

Review.Titre: cant change license to new mac (with update)
Review.Contenu: i've bought a license for my old mac, but when i bought a new mac and tried to change the license to it, an error occurred. I've tried to contact Parallels but there is no email support, and you can only get help via messenger, twitter, telegram, and community.How is that possible? I'm very upset with this lack of service. Very very poor service. Don't recommend at allUPDATE: Problem was solved after posting this review.

Review.Titre: No support at all
Review.Contenu: I just downloaded Parallels this week. I cannot get it running as I am having problems locating/creating a virtual machine. I have tried multiple times to get support. I even got a "ticket." Crickets. Do humans really work there? Very frustrating and disappointing. I would like to be able to use what I paid for.

Review.Titre: Not What the 5 star rating say
Review.Contenu: I have just signed up with Parallels for my Macbook Air 2020 M1 Chip. I cannot activate my windows pro as there is no Windows activation keys provided during set up. It just very shambolic in trying to find the solution and almost looks like a scam. There is no customer support or phone number on the website. Unbelievable I paid £59.00 for the subscription. I would suggest to people DO NOT see You Tubers and just blindly buy it. Do a little bit research before committing. Very disappointed

Review.Pseudo: Just as described, rapidly delivered, goodcustomer
Review.Titre: Tech support from hell.
Review.Contenu: Tech support from hell.I bought this to run CAT software. I had some basic questions about using Windows with a Mac keyboard. I tried calling but nobody would answer. I tried chat but their technology doesn’t work.I then called sales who managed to connect me to tech support. The gentleman I talked to was from an Indian call center. I could not understand what he said. I then gave up. I wasted 2 hours Obviously Parallels doesn’t care about customer support. Yesterday I them an e-mail. I have had no response.

Review.Titre: Great... if you like paying for adware
Review.Contenu: I purchased an annual license for Parallels Desktop 17 Pro Edition. Installation was easy.  The tool works fine - I get to run my Windows applications on my Mac, so it gets the job done.However, there are popups within the application that advertise for their own and 3rd party software.  These popups cannot be disabled (I confirmed with their support).  It is insane to me that I would pay a license fee to be pestered by ads within the software platform that I am paying for.  In addition to being very annoying, it feels invasive and trashy.  This is supposed to be a professional application, not a free poker app.

Review.Titre: License fee flip flop
Review.Contenu: I have used Parallels since it was first released. Trying to buy a second license. I log into my account and get a price of $79. But when I go to checkout it raises the price to $99. Not ethical. Tried one sever computers, same result.Skipping additional license

Review.Titre: Incredibly poor support
Review.Contenu: I've been trialing this software and have come across an issue with it.  I have tried using their chat system 4 times (it timed out and closed automatically while "waiting to connect to the next available agent").  I also put a post on the community forum and raised a support ticket.No response whatsoever after waiting several days.Unfortunately this means that I have been unable to evaluate it properly as the trial will end shortly.Based on this and the lack of support I can't recommend unfortunately.

Review.Titre: I am really getting frustrated and…
Review.Contenu: I am really getting frustrated and disappointed. My all work files are in parallel, and it doesn't load, and I can't use it. Your support channels not working, no response, no one to call. This is the worst customer service and experience ever. Windows start to load and circle spinning till it gets to pause. I tried to look everywhere to sort but doesn't work. I need to access my work programs asap and no one responding.

Review.Titre: Very slow machine and no support!
Review.Contenu: Parallels 16 slows down both my Mac and the virtual machine to the point where I need to re-start it again and again! Painfully slow performance on both machines. Their support is non-existent - I have waited 6 days for a reply on Messenger despite telling them it was urgent due to work. They simply ignored the reminders I sent them on Messenger in the past week.Support via chat now costs $99/year! I have asked for a full refund.

Review.Titre: Mac M1 parallels 17 issues
Review.Contenu: Mac M1 with fresh windows install. after 2 reboots... no more windows - inaccessible boot device.This is just not acceptable. after all this company almost force users to migrate every year to new versions. They should be more professinals...

Review.Titre: The software is ok, billing is not
Review.Contenu: The software is ok, not the easiest to setup and hard to remove. They also automatically set you up on recurring payments instead of letting you opt into it…which is borderline fraudulent since most folks will forget, get charged again and parallels will not refund your money.

Review.Titre: my windows vm keeps open crashing when…
Review.Contenu: my windows vm keeps open crashing when I open applications like Microsoft team and Power BI. the experience is bad when I run this applications really really bad, I bought the Business edition license because I wanted more speed but I am really disappointed  with the experience.

Review.Titre: Why did you remove my negative experience with Parallels?
Review.Contenu: Why did you remove my negative experience with Parallels?How do you increase the positive rating of this company?A negative experience should be removed or changed for the better only by the person who wrote it.I will remove Parallels from my MacBook forever.I do not trust Parallels and your rating on Trustpilot.

Review.Titre: The worst support ever received
Review.Contenu: The worst support ever received. After holding for 1hr for a support ticket, finally got connected to a support rep in India. The person was not so great and doing a screen share. He had my contact phone no and we got disconnected never received a call back and I am now holding again for an hour to get support. Don't waste your money when you really need it, it is the most useless company. After your response I have left messages and requested an escalation for your support manager to call I am still waiting it's now over 24hrs you have had the opportunity to resolve looks like you don't want to do it

Review.Titre: Bunch of Crooks!   Don't Deal With Them!
Review.Contenu: I purchased Parallels 16 in November 2020 with the promise it would work indefinitely.   However, a year later, when Apple changed to the Monterey operating system, Parallels no longer worked and now wants to charge me for an upgrade to 17.   This is legal breach of contract by Parallels.   Do not do business with them!Reviewer's response to Parallels' reply ...Since Parallels are not prepared to honour their 'lifetime' commitment with 16 by upgrading me to 17, I refuse to do business with such a buck-passing company, and invite others to do the same. There are probably alternative work-arounds for Mac users wanting to use Windows.

Review.Titre: Parallels International, avete fatto una figura di "windows"
Review.Contenu: Oggi mi è arrivata una email da Parallels che, in poche parole mi dice: "Se vuoi continuare ad usare il software che hai comprato nel 2018, devi sborsare altri 50 euro per l'aggiornamento altrimenti non funzionerà più sul Mac". Però con il 50% di sconto, altrimenti avrei dovuto pagare 99 euro. Che volgarità stile Windows. Ho acquistato Apple per non avere a che fare col mondo di windows. Vorrà dire che farò a meno di Parallels. Però, Parallels International, avete fatto proprio una figura di "windows"...

Review.Titre: Reset my mac and tried to reinstall
Review.Contenu: Reset my mac and tried to reinstall. They virtually made it impossible by channeling me through a maze of subscriptions to buy. Despite have a permanent license. Felt completely scammed and gave up.

Review.Titre: Could not give a monkeys about you as a customer
Review.Contenu: Quite frankly, the most appalling customer service you will ever get.  They have no concept of customer care.  Try and cancel a subscription and get a pro-rata refund - no (will paste link their no-refund policy)Try and move from the paid subscription back into the one-off payment stand alone plan - you can't do that.  Stop subscribing and you lose access.Ask them why they don't support Direct X 12 for gaming on windows, or when they might do - no reply.Try and get support and be sent around 50+ links in their forums which don't answer the question - check.Honestly - look elsewhere.P.S.  I'm sure to get the standard, insincere response from Parallels - promising to fix it if I just reach out to them.   This is their way of just fobbing off bad reviews.

Review.Titre: You have to purchase a new license of Windows
Review.Contenu: You have to purchase a new license of windows when you upgrade from an intel Mac to a M1 Processor Mac. You cannot just port it over as I have in the past. This is not the same seamless experience I have enjoyed in the past when purchasing new apple hardware. So, I do not call this "Fully Compatible".The advertising is misleading by omission. For a long time user like me, I am disappointed. I do not want support to fix something that was never explained prior to the upgrade. It is misleading advertising and very time consuming with additional expense. BTW, You have my number you did not call. Do not imply you will call to help. You clearly do not have any sort of a workaround that will not cost me extra $ for more software. Have a good day. :) Steve

Review.Titre: Awful Software Awful Support
Review.Contenu: The software slows my mac down terribly and support has been ignoring me, really poor service.Edit - The problem isn't my mac, its runs perfectly until I turn parallels on. For support you can just answer my multiple ignored msgs thanks

Review.Titre: Poor Support Process
Review.Contenu: We have used Parallels for a while now and never had to really use support, we have had just had a query as to why we could not set up Windows 11 on our iMac desktop application (we need it for development work we are doing) and its now been a week and all we have had from the support team is can you resend the detail we already gave them when we created the support ticket, and that was only 2 days ago, a full 6 days after we created the ticket.What is even more annoying is they are almost impossible to contact and have no complaints process and seem to believe support is based upon sending you to as many of their info pages as possible.Over a week waiting for a business support request is extremely poor.

Review.Titre: I've been to the support center many…
Review.Contenu: I've been to the support center many times, spent 3 hours trying to set Parallels up and it's still not working. I thought this would be to set up, but now I'm annoyed and really pissed off.

Review.Titre: Student discount fiasco
Review.Contenu: Followed the student discount offer on their site and was asked to upload a document with proof of Institute Student Number Photo and Name. Sent this and received an e-mail saying they needed to confirm my 'status'. I did not understand what they meant by this. I further sent screen grabs of me signed into my College and also an e-mail from my Tutor form that week about that week's lesson.They then sent an e-mail saying I was not eligible as had exceeded upload limit. Why bother with a student discount if you do not want to honour it for half of these people. Total joke

Review.Titre: Unable to get through to customer support...
Review.Contenu: Unable to get through to customer support to renew my subscription. Updated my payment details but Paypal not working on their website. The website doesn't work properly and keeps redirecting me to the same 'help' article that doesn't help.

Review.Titre: It is a terrible product
Review.Contenu: It is a terrible product. I worked with v10 and later purchased v12 by hoping it would work better. But none works properly on both my old and new macs. Briefly:- Not proper network connection- Terrible resolution settings. - Slow and sluggish performance

Review.Titre: Parallells customer support deleted important files and folders on my computer
Review.Contenu: The latest Parallels Desktop software had some serious issues, and I was given remote help to fix it. I was not told to back up anything before the work started. The guy who "helped" me accidentally deleted the whole virtual machine, taking important work files with it. He was then unable to do anything but install a new empty virtual machine as the files and folders I had were gone! After speaking to someone else at their so-called help desk, I was told someone from their technical department would contact me. Two months and several reminders later, I have still not heard from them!This is an unprofessional company with a flawed product and poor customer service. You'll be safer using a virtual machine software from another company.

Review.Titre: Unresponsive and unhelpful customer service
Review.Contenu: I have purchased parallels desktop 17 pro edition for my new macbook m1 max edition in order to use some windows apps and most likely having a new experience. Since the beginning of my first installation, the taskbar seemed non responsive and stopped responding even if i tried all the given workarounds regarding this specific issue. When i contacted the customer representatives for support, they did not respond mefor more than 24 hours and by the next day i had a message from them sending me link about a completely different issue. That's all that i had from parallels since three days. I sadly can not accept this kind of behaviour and would like to cancel my subscription right away and requesting for refund. I will never use your products again. Thank you

Review.Titre: Horrible Customer Service / Resolved
Review.Contenu: I've been a customer since 2010.  Only use Parallels for Quicken.  In the last couple of years, Customer Service is the worst I have ever come across.I have an open support ticket from 9/21/2021.  I had contacted Parallels via Twitter & FB.  I have received at least 6 emails stating "We are writing to follow up with you about your issue/question with ticket ID #xxxxxxx. We have not heard back from you in the last two days and would like to know if there is anything else that we can do to assist you?"I have replied to these emails and also under my account.Since I haven't received a response in two months, I am leaving this review hoping I will get somebody to contact me.11/17/2021 Update.  I received an immediate response from Parallels CS Team, and they successfully resolved my issue.

Review.Titre: I have not renewed the subscription.
Review.Contenu: I have not renewed the subscription.By the contrary, I have just canceled the auto-renewal, via Please take not I did it via clever bridge„Subscription auto-renewal canceled”

Review.Titre: Very flawed product and non existent support!
Review.Contenu: Parallels promised immediate help after a review here, but I have not received any help from them at all! They have not responded to my support ticket (created 40 hours ago) or answered messages or posts on their Facebook page. They have created numerous posts on Facebook since I contacted them, but they have blatantly ignored my attempts to contact them about a serious issue with their product. I have been a paying customer of their's for many years. Their product is very flawed, having caused me a number of issues since upgrading to Parallels 16 last year, yet they decide to completely ignore any support requests. I'm apparently not the only one who's experienced problems with their products or poor customer services. I will take this up with my professional translation colleagues on Proz.com. Parallels will not be recommended to anyone from me!

Review.Titre: No more support for Russia
Review.Contenu: No more support for Russia, also no more subscription prolongation.Today it is problem for Russia, tommorow to your country and nation.

Review.Titre: No response to customer service…
Review.Contenu: No response to customer service requests. Purchased a pro subscription as they promise better support, but they simply ignore all support requests. Disappointing.

Review.Titre: When you have questions (I was a past…
Review.Contenu: When you have questions (I was a past user of the product) but there is NO PHONE number to even speak with a salesperson, sorry, I can put any money into this.

Review.Titre: Less than a year since I bought…
Review.Contenu: Less than a year since I bought parallels 15 and they don't offer a free update for Big Sur users. If you want it, you have to pay again! I don't recommend it.

Review.Titre: Terrible Company, Good Product
Review.Contenu: Terrible company who lies to you in their promotional materials, a lot. Very scummy. The product is good, but I wouldn't do business with Parallels.

Review.Titre: You had no permission to charge my…
Review.Contenu: You had not permission to charge my account for a renewal and you do not make it easy to communicate.  This product at is best sucks.

Review.Titre: Constant Runaround with No Solution
Review.Contenu: Every time you call in, they never pick up. I've waited over 30 minutes twice already. You write a ticket, it takes 3-5 business days to answer. You provide the support/ticket number, they want your key code if you have a question about your subscription. It is always a runaround. They tell me to read a specific page, which I already have. I clearly explained that I cannot install because I installed on too many devices. I explained that I tried installing on multiple m1 Macs to try to see if I can get a specific software that I need to run on Windows, which was why I installed it on a couple extra computers. I also ended up wiping my current intel Mac only to reinstall everything again. Even with this clear explanation, they ask me for my key code. If you have my support number and email, you would easily be able to find my account information and key code. Instead, I get an email about 3-5 days later asking for my key code because I have two of them. I only have one license.

Review.Titre: Terrible customer experience. The worst in the industry!
Review.Contenu: I contacted their call center. And after the agent's initial spiel, I heard nothing more. I kept saying hello, hello and it looks like I was talking to a ghost. So I decided to stay on the line, hoping he would eventually talk but to no avail. 10 mins had passed and I got nothing. The agent then hung up on me. 10 mins  of my time, wasted. I called again and when I thought I got connected to an agent, the call dropped. Terrible customer experience!!!! After I made this review, someone from the team contacted me only to clarify what my original question was and without empathy nor apologies. I still needed to spell the word apology for the agent to say it. But, isn’t it supposed to be a common courtesy to empathize with the customer if she had a terrible experience with the company? I appreciate that someone reach out to me, but I personally think, they really need to work on their customer service. Getting the customer to buy is one thing, but keeping the customer is another.

Review.Titre: For $79 a year - go purchase a computer for your needs - no help in any form
Review.Contenu: For $79 - no “ subscription key “ I needed to get into parallels to get Window- after an hour on the phone waiting for help- was told to call back later- trying help via chat- a no go - googling for an hour nothing - lots of folks in the forum wanting same help - defeated - realized instead of paying for parallels - I will go purchase a Window friendly computer- just spent $$$$$ on the new Mac for this -Apple care of no help bc this app is a third party- even tho they sell it in their store and no boot camp on new computer-what a wasteI’ll say they started emailing relentlessly and were of zero help - 1st saying they couldn’t find where I signed up- I sent them my receipt- then they asked me to screenshot the problem!!!!! I spent 4-6 hours trying to contact someone - why am I going to do that - never asked about the original problem The Subscription key - I think I rementioned this to them at least 10 times- they kept trying to tell my how to cancel- turns out I managed to w out their help afterwards I spoke to Apples legal team to make sure- never never deal with these “People”

Review.Titre: I ordered and paid a renewal of my…
Review.Contenu: I ordered and paid a renewal of my Parallels Subscriptions, but it was not activated in my account. I got ripped off.

Review.Titre: $99 a year for a permanent license.
Review.Contenu: I  have a permanent license to parallels.  However, I am dinged every year for $99.  This appears excessive.

Review.Titre: No help online, no phone support. Advertising 24/7 phone support
Review.Contenu: No help online. On hold 2 hours. What the hell? Please connect me with a human.

Review.Titre: Parallels
Review.Contenu: The company (which makes Parallel) disappointed me a lot. I have been using Parallels since version 8.I currently have version 14, which doesn't work well and is useless these days (MacBookPro), and I bought version 16 last week.But there was a problem because I couldn't access my customer account. There is no "live" support from this company.I wrote on Messenger and I also wrote on the form. And the result? Instead of simply solving my account problem, they returned my money, and instead of version 16, I have back a malfunctioning version 14. An important question for this company:"Do you have a basic knowledge of marketing and how to take care of customers? Are you wasting money on advertising and saving on the care of long-standing existing customers?"I do not recommend this company even though it has an interesting product because if you have a problem, instead of solving it, you will have to read dozens of pages about other possible problems and eventually give it up. This company may have a good product, but it doesn't even want to take care of its customers.Just as wind kills flowers as this company kills its customers by its lack of interest in the customer and zero support in solving problems.

Review.Titre: Absolutely inacceptable as I get a mail…
Review.Contenu: Absolutely inacceptable as I get a mail that I renewed, but I didn't renewed at all!

Review.Titre: When it worked it was a great VM…
Review.Contenu: When it worked it was a great VM software but unfortunately I was getting BSOD multiple times so it was not reliable enough for me to use for the software I intended to use with it

Review.Titre: Cancel suscription and refund
Review.Contenu: I encountered significant difficulties accessing my account on the Parallels website when attempting to cancel my subscription. I invested hours across different days, only to realize that I might have inadvertently paid for a yearly subscription, as I couldn't locate any subscription details in my Parallels account.Just a few days ago, I received a PayPal receipt for 600 Swedish crowns, despite not actively using Parallels due to compatibility issues with my Mac. I've switched to using a PC instead. The frustration is compounded by the fact that I haven't received a response from Parallels yet.I'm eager to resolve this situation promptly. A refund would be greatly appreciated, along with the closure of the seemingly elusive subscription that I can't locate anywhere in my account. At this point, I feel deceived and quite helpless. Your prompt attention to this matter would be highly valued.

Review.Titre: Great Software But Don't Like SaaS (at all)!
Review.Contenu: I love the software but absolutely do not like the subscription based model. It seems I purchased a "service" and not software. Why not just get a cheap windows laptop that you actually own instead of an annual lease.Therefore, 1 year and I'm out. Pity as the software runs very well.

Review.Titre: don't bother with Windows 10 under Parallels 18
Review.Contenu: If you want to run Windows 10, good luck.  Support for Windows 10 appears to be nonexistent now that 11 is supported.  In particular, using hardware devices with Parallels 18 is nearly impossible.  I could not successfully install a Canon PRO-100 printer driver.  I installed an Epson V30 scanner driver successfully, but the scanner does not work on Windows 10 under Parallels 18.  I did get a generic DVD driver (USB) to work, and that's the only external hardware that I was able to use successfully in Windows 10 under Parallels 18.  So the pipe dream idea of using a M1/M2 Mac to replace your Windows 10 PC is a fantasy.  If this is your goal, don't bother.

Review.Titre: Scam, but works
Review.Contenu: While parallels does work, they made it so I could not sign back into my account and have begun charging me yearly for it and I cannot stop it from my end. Had to cancel my debit card and go through all of that hassle to end my subscription.

Review.Titre: Just upgraded to MacOS Ventura...
Review.Contenu: Just upgraded to MacOS Ventura. Parallels started fine and asks, if I would like an update. Fine! I thought....No word that this is a new version and that I have to pay. Took me half an hour to get back my old version.This is called a "rip off" in english, I think!

Review.Titre: Deceptive pricing & other issues
Review.Contenu: The pricing on their website is deceptive. I wanted to buy the NON-SUBSCRIPTION version of Parallels Desktop. On their website I selected this version and then the button for 'Buy now for £89.99'. After I selected this, they show another screen with the SUBSCRIPTION version selected and the non-subscription version showing an increased price of about £126. This is very mischievous pricing to say the least!  I contacted Parallels support and the person wouldn't accept that this is deceptive pricing and wouldn't tell me how to buy the product for the price on the 'Buy now for £89.99' button I selected on their website. He tried to tell me that that price is only for the subscription but that is not what I selected and it's not what it says on the button.I got around this nonsense by searching for a Parallels coupon and getting approximately the correct price.Other issues:I'm UK based so I wanted to buy Parrallels in pounds sterling and receive their marketing emails in English but as I happen to be in France they are sending their marketing emails in French. I tried via support to point out that they should use the user's language settings not his location for their marketing language but they wouldn't accept what I was telling them. If I had been in China would they have been sending marketing emails in Chinese?I used the trial period to evaluate the product and I thought I would try a program that works without problems on my Windows 10 PC, which happened to be the antivirus AVG-Free. It would not run in the virtual Windows 11 under Parallels. I exchanged emails with their support, as I can't tell if this is a Windows 11 problem or a Parallels problem or that it doesn't run on my Mac's M2 processor.  I got nowhere with their support. I asked them to try it themselves by downloading AVG-Free but they wouldn't. They eventually gave up and told me to contact Microsoft, which of course would be pointless.

Review.Titre: Great product, harsh upgrade policy, terrible support
Review.Contenu: Software works well. Make sure you check the last time Parallels released a new version before purchasing a desktop license.I bought a license for v16 on 29th of July 2021. 11 days later they released v17, but the policy is that a free upgrade will only be offered for purchases made after August 1st (3 days after I bought it).Have been waiting 3 weeks for support to respond to a query about this issue.

Review.Titre: works ok but each update contains more…
Review.Contenu: works ok but each update contains more bloatware and forced upon features. Focus less on the gimmicks and more on the software itself. e.g. latest updates cause the screen to flicker and have all sorts of glitches - solved by reinstalling parallels tools- the updates should automatically run these updates o r users should be notified to run them - instead we are left to fend for ourselves with a crapshoot for support

Review.Titre: Trial = 1 Year subscription
Review.Contenu: It's a ok product but careful when you sign up.All "trials" will end up in you paying for a full year (or more if you don't keep track)Buy it and immediately cancel to avoid unneccesary costs.

Review.Titre: Good software but with memories issues
Review.Contenu: In general, I haven't had a good experience with Parallels. The big issue for me is related to memory. Every time I use the software, it doesn't matter how much memory is available on my Mac (8, 9, 10, 11GB) and, even without downloading anything, a message about almost full storage space appears. At such times I need to restart the computer. For example, yesterday, with 8GB storage available, I needed to used Notepad to paste something and that message appeared on the screen.So, I have avoided using the software, which is a shame, because, when I started using it, everything was working perfectly.

Review.Titre: After the last update
Review.Contenu: After the last update, I can not access to Mac files from VisualStudio in Parallels it says"The solution or project you want to open is located in a directory that is the application does not have permission to work in  "

Review.Titre: Great product, horrible support
Review.Contenu: I am using Parallels Desktop for Mac. The product is great and allows me to run a Win10 VM machine with little effort spent on configuration etc.The only downside of the product is that the Windows screen sometimes turns black and I have to reset the VM (basically a restart).The biggest issue I have is with the support. I asked them to send my subscription renewal receipt because I didn't have access to the account used to setup my subscription. Support was unable to help even after I sent my product key and because of response times of between 3h-12h for every message I missed the deadline given by the finance department of my company. I had to contact the former employee who setup the account who was able to help me gain access to the emailadress which was used to setup the subscription.

Review.Titre: Frustrating, sluggish performance
Review.Contenu: Ongoing performance issues make using Parallels increasingly frustrating to use. Following troubleshooting advice in Parallels knowledge base doesn't seem to help. Some times performance is ok for one or two sessions, but then it starts to take several minutes to start the VM, and then apps and keyboard and mouse input freeze for 10-20 seconds at a time. There are tons of threads on Parallel's forums about performance with people reporting similar issues, most of which never get resolved.The features set is great and perhaps unmatched, but the performance makes me just want to use competitor's products, even free open source ones.UPDATE:Six days later, and I've still only had one email from Parallels support that didn't help. I've sent multiple technical reports. All attempts to start a chat with someone have been futile.

Review.Titre: Over 6 weeks now and still can't use the program. Now they won't even give refund. See my update!!
Review.Contenu: I opened a support ticket in October. #3074866. After many back and forth emails with support, I still have not been able to use the program. I need to use one of the Legacy programs from my old iMac that needs to run on Sierra on the new computer using BigSur. No attempts to help me have worked and even though they said they were going to accelerate the ticket, here we are, no joy. I finally asked early in December for a refund. The had the nerve to tell me " Unfortunately, we cannot make a refund, since more than 30 days have passed since the purchase and activation". Wow. I wonder if Fusion is still around? I used it a long time ago successfully.This site works! Just a few hours after my review, Parallels refunded my money but still said they wanted to see if they could resolve the issue. Not sure I'll take them up on that. We'll see. I'm happy with the refund. Thanks Parallels!

Review.Titre: Given 2 rating mainly because I still…
Review.Contenu: Given 2 rating mainly because I still haven’t got a fully fledged Windows 11 OS. Installed Parallels desktop 17 on my MacBook Air 2020 M1. Purchased a retail windows 11 product key and registered the key fine. Installed windows 11 fine. But in settings I still cannot personalise fully because it keeps asking me to register. I registered with my Microsoft account, it then asks for the windows account. I thought they were the same?I tried calling support UK but I couldn’t input my support ticket due to it asking for the ticket number followed by ‘pound’? There is no ‘pound’/£ key on my phone?Probably part my lack of experience doing something like this and a few anomalies with the Parallel? Chat support was useless as the chat associate took so long to respond following our initial greetings, it timed out 3 times.My question still is if I have done the steps I have, shouldn’t I have a fully operational OS or have I missed a few steps?

Review.Titre: Company with quite sharp business…
Review.Contenu: Company with quite sharp business practices, and a conveniently selective customer service.I bought a license for v16 on June 23rd, and oops, not even two months later, the new version drops.Grace period? Nope. Discount for recently purchased license? Nope.Despite TWO tickets mentioning it to CS, plus PM on Facebook, not a word back, it's been more than a week.Purchase a license at your own peril, these people don't seem to care.EDIT to answer the below: you can wrap it in any candy colored gift-wrap you want, your response is unacceptable. It IS sharp business practices to not offer a substantial rebate when a license was purchased less than 2 months ago, and if that's the pretext to try to shove down your users' throat your subscription model, you're singularly failing at it.Secondly, there is no excuse for your CS not responding to any inquiries on this, see your own forum, there's even a thread about that.Enough said.

Review.Titre: PAID but No License, No Support
Review.Contenu: Received Activation Code after posting the below comment to Trustpilot. (They said it was sent earlier but I have no evidence of that.) I am glad they got back to me, but wish it had not gotten to this point. Simple access to a responsive Customer Support is much better for everyone.*****************************************************************I purchased Parallels for my M1 Mac Mini. I paid for the application and received my registration key online (not printable in anyway). It was on a website page that I was forwarded to after I paid. I wrote down what was apparently a wrong number and entered that into the key space. The website told me that was the wrong kind of number, so I tried to go backward but that original page would not reproduce. I’ve paid, but am “not licensed” and my trial 14 days are about to run out. I have sent many messages to Support but have not received my reg key. I have called multiple times but “all the agents are busy, try calling back later” is the persistent message. I can’t get what I have legitimately paid for. Where is the customer support?

Review.Titre: A great ,simple product but very hard…
Review.Contenu: A great ,simple product but very hard to receive effective backup and information in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Mac web browsers fail after launching Parallels.
Review.Contenu: ~16 May - I have had difficulty with in internet connectivity issue that requires technical support to resolve.  Today is my second attempt to reach the 24/7 phone and chat line which thus far has stated Parallels is busy helping other callers  and to try back later.  Meanwhile, chat times out.  So I thought I'd document the number of times I'm required to call/chat in order to get through.  Day 2 thus far and not able to reach anyone.  I like the product but technical support either has capacity challenges or is not actually 24/7.  We'll see what tomorrow yields.So...after an hour wait and 3 attempts on day 2, I was able to get through.  Technician was very kind but was not able to resolved the issue which will need to be elevated.  I'll keep you posted on what comes next.29 May - The initial technician who helped me has remain engaged but the problem remains.  Thus far I have taken a screen capture that the technician stated was not helpful and that a system report was required.  Upon generating and submitting the system report via Parallels, the technician stated that the report was not readable and requested that I email the files to him.  After attaching the 35 Parallels generated files, Parallels' email server rejected the email I sent stating the email was too large.  I followed up with 35 separate emails, 4 of which were rejected once again by the Parallels email server.  That's where we are at the moment.  I'll keep you posted.

Review.Titre: Problem is not fixed
No Support
Review.Contenu: You wouldn't let a few bad reviews put you off buying Parallels would you? Well, read just a few of the bad reviews and you will soon see what the common problem is:NO CUSTOMER SUPPORTWhen you read a review that says Parallels has no customer support, believe it. All those good reviews? They're people who have never tried to contact Parallels Customer Support. I was one of those people. I have used Parallels for years without needing to contact support. But the first time I need it? Nothing. Because when you need it, it doesn't exist.What more proof? Read Parallels' own Forum. This is my issue, and it is an issue that has obviously affected a lot of people with M1 Macs. But has Parallels fixed the issue or even provided any help to any of these people (myself included)?No. Read and see for yourself: (OK, can't post link, but search the title ".NET framework 3.5 not downloading")This is not the only issue I have had with Parallels on my M1 Mac. I currently have two outstanding Support Tickets. They have been outstanding for two weeks now and not one of them has been addressed. No emails. No contact. Nada.Parallels will take your money and flip you the bird. Consider yourself lucky if everything works. Then consider what you would do if you were not so lucky and everything stopped working . . . and there was no-one to help you.The icing on the no-Customer Service cake? When I contacted Cleverbridge for a full refund, they replied within hours. The matter was referred to Parallels, which – suprise, surprise – did reply (but still not to my outstanding support tickets - go figure!). They replied to inform me I was not entitled to a refund. Even though under Australian law, if you purchase something that doesn't work, you have a legal right to a full refund.The reason for not qualifying for a refund? Because it has been more than 30 days since purchase.The reason it had been more than 30 days? Because I am still waiting after two weeks for someone from Parallels Customer Support to contact me about my issues. I have even sent them follow-up emails and received nothing.If, after reading this, you still want to buy Parallels, why not contact Customer Support yourself to enquire about their products. See how long it takes for them to reply – or not. Then – and only then – make your decision.Still not convinced? Go read some more of those bad reviews and see how many were resolved – even after Parallels pretended to help them on Trustpilot.Also, have a look at just how many of the bad reviews have been lodged here in the past month and year – a very large percentage. Why is that? Dont let the Star Rating fool you. They may have been a decent company once, but not any more. I've used Parallels for years, but I'll never use them again. I wish I'd never upgraded.Talk is cheap. Parallels is not.RESPONSE TO PARALLELSThe knowledge base article fix does not work – it was the first thing I tried,There is a whole thread devoted to this issue, the link to which I cannot post here, but it is on the Parallels Forum and is quite a few pages long.I have contacted you to process my refund. I note that even now I still have no response to my two outstanding support tickets. I will keep Trustpilot updated on how this eventuates.UPDATEIt's a shame Parallels isn't as quick with their customer support as they are to address issues on Trustpilot. So the solution to my problem was apparently to upgrade to Parallels 17. I asked for a refund and it arrived today. Thank you. As much as I am tempted to buy Parallels 17 with the refund, in all this time I still haven't received a response to my two support tickets. I'm sure they've been cancelled by now, but I'm not confident things have changed. I'm adding one more star for the refund – because at least I got that – but I don't think I would have gotten it without Trustpilot

Review.Titre: Parallels is too good
Review.Contenu: Parallels is too good. I was first confused with desktop-sharing with Mac.This can be because I was a user of old version of fusion, which is not compatible with M1 nor M2 stone bearing Mac. I am all right to pay USD100 for parallels but not for Windows OS. Can we continue to use Windows OS without paying to them?

Review.Titre: Parallels on a MacBook ... future
Review.Contenu: I have chosen Parallels because I have to run Microsoft Project on my MacBook.In the beginning everything seems alright although I recently receives messages that Parallels will no longer be able to run on MacBook.This is really confusing.

Review.Titre: Excellent knowledge base, once you find the right article
Review.Contenu: I used the online chat to better understand a couple minor issues I was having with setting up a VM on an M1 Mac.  The chat agent ultimately led me to the the KB articles I needed that were precisely what I needed.   So the end result was positive.   The chat itself felt a little strained.   While I frequently use chat for support, this time it felt more difficult to get to the answer I wanted. My rapport with the agent was not great.   Ultimately, I got to what I needed to know.Having said that, I am not terribly pleased with Parallels support for Apple Silicon.  I would have expected that we would be able to control the ARM-based VMs in the same we controlled the x86 VMs and my confidence in getting there has been shaken.

Review.Titre: No customer support for initial purchase
Review.Contenu: I’m trying to purchase but not sure which program I am supposed to get. I’ve tried to contact the company. There is no phone number and it’s almost impossible to get in touch to get help. I am hoping this will enable a real human being??? 🤞

Review.Titre: Runs well still locks out my windows…
Review.Contenu: Runs well still locks out my windows hard drive external

Review.Titre: Beware unwanted subscriptions
Review.Contenu: The company behind this product, Cleverbridge ag, renewed my annual - unwanted - Parallels subscription without warning, without consent and without option to refund. The net shows many others with similar complaints. After my critical Trustpilot review Parallels got in touch promptly and refunded, for which thanks, but that doesn't help others caught out. Another tech company emailed me just now to alert me their subscription will fall due in two days time, with an option to cancel. Parallels / Cleverbridge please copy.

Review.Titre: I recommend using only if you have a iMac
Review.Contenu: I have been operating on a macbook air 17 inch and the parallels VM takes up way too much space. There are other options out there which take up far less such as a Linux OS. I learned from my mistake though. I will be cancelling my subscription but I want to thank the parallels team for replying to my support tickets whenever I opened them. Its a great service just took up too much space. I tried moving it to a external card my VM but lost 30k in crypto.

Review.Titre: Parallels was easy enough to install, but...
Review.Contenu: Parallels was easy enough to install, but getting Windows installed in Parallels was more difficult than expected. A lot of nonsense and it still isn't right. I don't know who is at fault, but I was expecting Parallels to have an very easy path for this and they didn't.

Review.Titre: Great platform, but...
Review.Contenu: Great platform, and I would love to keep using it, but the price is way too costly. I want to buy it, but the standard edition for one time purchase is $100, which is way out of my budget. Especially since I can't upgrade without paying, so I would be stuck. The yearly plans are a lot of money too. If it was more cost friendly, I would keep using it and buy it, the trial doesn't last long enough! On the site, it says $80 one time purchase but when you click on the offer, it says $100 which is ridiculous. I'm just a home user especially, and just use it to run windows apps.

Review.Titre: It's a good product.
Review.Contenu: It's a good product.Parallels works well and does lots of cool things.  However I don't like the business practice of holding your VMs hostage if you don't constantly renew/upgrade the product.  If your subscription lapses, kiss your virtual machines goodbye until you pay more money...

Review.Titre: The reason I subscribe to Parallels is…
Review.Contenu: The reason I subscribe to Parallels is that I am an Apple user, but have two programs that will not work on Apple.  Parallels allows me to do that.  I don't need any bells and whistles supplied by Parallels and/or Microsoft.  I just want a meat-and-potatoes version.

Review.Titre: If I were just rating the performance…
Review.Contenu: If I were just rating the performance of Parallels I'd rate it a 4.0 - 4.5 if that were an option. BUT.Parallels have gotten greedy over time. The aim seems to be to force everyone onto a subscription. I dump apps that are subscription only. NO ifs or buts!Paid upgrades if you want the lifetime licence are too frequent and expensive.I'm rapidly approaching the dump Parallels position. While it's useful and has helped me when I need to run Win on my MacBook it is reaching the stage where I will drop Windows use altogether, simply because of Parallels greed.In interests of full transparency I should say that while I have used Parallels at times for some years, it was my time at a certain 'major' that got me hooked (Free licence though a messy renewal each year). Now that I've retired from there (70 + major heart attack) the pay regularly, which I've just had to do, or subscription become a greater focus

Review.Titre: New billings
Review.Contenu: I don't like the new system for billing. Before I can use Paralells for many years without upgrade, now I can use it only one year and I don't agree.

Review.Titre: Parallels will lock up from time to…
Review.Contenu: Parallels will lock up from time to time.  I have to force quit and then start over.

Review.Titre: Great but it's some unfair because i…
Review.Contenu: Great but it's some unfair because i update my parallels a month ago and now you release a new version... What can i do??

Review.Titre: Resetting worked
Review.Contenu: Resetting worked. It should of been the first thing to try. Upgrade of Windows.

Review.Titre: Parallels Support is Slow and not 24/7
Review.Contenu: After 4 days, my problem has been resolved. I changed the ratings from a one to a three and changed the title of the review.********************Original Review:I have a subscription for Parallels Desktop® 16 for Mac, Standard Edition Version. This is what the Parallels website states about support:Parallels Desktop comes with 24/7 phone, chat and email support.* Subscription licenses come with phone, chat and email support available for the lifetime of the subscription.Since the latest update to the MAC OS which is 11.2.1 (Big Sur) on 02/12/2021, the Parallels Desktop Virtual Machine (Windows 10) has not been able to connect to the network or internet.Today I tried the chat support feature and was number 4 in line. Three hours later when I was number 1 in line, the chat box provided this message:We are sorry, all of our operators are off-line at the moment. Please check back later, or use an alternative contact method.Then I tried the phone support number 888-811-2459 and was place on phone hold. The automated response first stated that all operators were busy and that I would be helped when the next operator was available.  After about 5 minutes, an automated message said that all operators were busy and to call back later.This is NOT 24/7 phone or chat support.Additionally, based on Parallels own support discussion forums, these technical problems have been present since early February and Parallels has not been able to resolve the problems and distribute an update to correct it.

Review.Titre: Good product but watch out unexpected price increase during checkout
